structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: Insurance coverage for assistance rendered under KRS 431.007.
law.text: When a peace officer specified in KRS 431.007 is lawfully conducting an assistance operation under KRS 431.007, any insurance relative to the performance of his duties, including, but not limited to, workers' compensation, health, liability, and motor vehicle insurance, maintained by the peace officer or the peace officer's employer, shall remain in force.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 515, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
